title: Star Guardian club
body: So I thought since most of these quests require 5 man premade I started a club to help people find others that are willing to play Invasion. Add me/comment below if ya wanna join.

replies.body: Definitely interested. Sent you a Friend request :)

Looking to join!

Sent you a friend request.
